The NCC Image Checker browser extension shows image waste overlays on top of your images: chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ncc-image-checker/fphiheficgnpphmjdliclanppccfgifl Red is too big (waste) Green is good Blue is too small (blurry) The really bad results are on a 1x screen. The better results are a 2x screen.
